text1: A state-of-art modified Wolf with a phase cloak system and an impressive weapons package that allows it to punch far above its weight.
A ship boasting a shield and a phase cloak
An overclocker mjolnir designed to output major damage. Naturally the flux cost increases, as well as the mechanical allocation effort.

An experimental weapon that uses properties of abyssal monstrosities to traverse simultaneously in several dimensions, entering p-space or n-space fully only when it may deliver its payload do a physical system.
